metadata.name: try_swf_7
metadata.description: Tests ActionTry (0x8F) and ActionThrow (0x2A) opcodes for exception handling with try-catch blocks. Validates proper control flow with setjmp/longjmp, exception state management, and catch variable binding.

features_tested: Proper control flow (throw stops try block execution)
features_implemented_not_tested: No exception path (try completes without throw)
implementation_notes: Uses setjmp/longjmp for exception handling in generated C code
Inline setjmp via ACTION_TRY_SETJMP macro ensures proper stack frame
Global exception state tracks thrown values and handler depth
Supports both catch-to-variable and catch-to-register modes
Any ActionScript type can be thrown (stored as ActionVar)
